title: Artify – Online Art Sharing Platform
description: Artify is an interactive platform where artists can upload and showcase artworks. Users can explore galleries, save favorites, and connect through appreciation. Focuses on creativity, smooth UI, and global sharing.

title: SkillSwap – A Local Skill Exchange Platform
description: SkillSwap connects people locally to exchange and learn skills such as music, languages, coding, fitness, and more. Users can offer services or learn from others in a skill marketplace.

title: TicketBari – Online Ticket Booking Platform
description: TicketBari is a complete online travel ticket booking platform built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Users can discover, book, and manage tickets for Bus, Train, Launch, and Plane journeys across Bangladesh. The platform features three distinct user roles: User, Vendor, and Admin.

title: Zap Shift Delivery – Parcel Delivery Platform
description: Zap Shift Delivery is a fast, secure, and scalable MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) parcel delivery platform built for three roles: Users, Riders, and Admins. The platform supports JWT authentication, role-based access control, and optional real-time tracking.
